content.question: Using the excerpt, respond to parts A and B. Identify TWO specific examples of scientific discovery that support Cohen’s argument and explain how each one supports his argument. Explain ONE way in which the shift in scientific inquiry described by Cohen affected European views of society or politics in the seventeenth and eighteenth centuries.

topic.text: 4.7: Causation in the Age of Scientific Revolution and Enlightenment

skill.text: Skill 3.D: Explain how claims or evidence support, modify, or refute a source's argument.
